sys_script.name: Follower

sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script"><sys_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><abort_action>false</abort_action><access>package_private</access><action_delete>false</action_delete><action_insert>false</action_insert><action_query>true</action_query><action_update>false</action_update><active>false</active><add_message>false</add_message><advanced>true</advanced><change_fields>false</change_fields><client_callable>false</client_callable><collection>x_942661_fitness_follower</collection><condition/><description/><execute_function>false</execute_function><filter_condition/><is_rest>false</is_rest><message/><name>Follower</name><order>100</order><priority>100</priority><rest_method/><rest_method_text/><rest_service/><rest_service_text/><rest_variables/><role_conditions/><script><![CDATA[(function executeRule(current, previous /*null when async*/) {

	// Get the record if logged in user following someone or user is followed by someone else.
	if(!gs.getUserName("admin"))
	current.addQuery("user",gs.getUserID()).addOrCondition("follower",gs.getUserID());

})(current, previous);]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2022-12-16 10:39:10</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>f327eb6d47371110d5ff7868f36d4396</sys_id><sys_mod_count>3</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Follower</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="FitnessTracker" source="x_942661_fitness">ba87ecee47231110d5ff7868f36d43ef</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="FitnessTracker">ba87ecee47231110d5ff7868f36d43ef</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_f327eb6d47371110d5ff7868f36d4396</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2023-01-02 18:52:36</sys_updated_on><template/><when>before</when></sys_script><sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=f327eb6d47371110d5ff7868f36d4396"/></record_update>
